name: 莱斯·马修·邦德
name_full: 莱斯·马修·邦德 Rhys Matthew Bond

last_movies.title: The Unauthorized Saved by the Bell Story

introduction: Rhys Matthew Bond was born in Hampstead, London on June 11, 1998 to Neil and Tirana Bond, where he lived with his family before moving to British Columbia, Canada when he was just ten years old. His younger sister, Zoe Farah Bond is also an aspiring actress.When Rhys was younger he always enjoyed performing in front of an audience, often times re-enacting Superhero scenes from movies and tv shows by saving his younger sister, Zoe from all kinds of danger.“The road to success is working hard and being the best.”Rhys began his educational career while living in British Columbia as a Visual Arts student but when he went into high school, he switched majors to Drama and began persuing acting. While in school, he also practiced in outside Professional Acting lessons and classes to further develop his acting skills and participated in many school plays.His first acting credit was when he starred as Jason in the episode “Near Mint Condition” of the television series, R.L. Stine’s The Haunting Hour back in 2014. Also in 2014, he starred in The Unauthorized Saved By The Bell Story as an Obnoxious High Schooler while being featured in a few commercials. In 2015, Rhys starred in Ties That Bind as one of the main characters, Cameron Olson which is one of the two roles he’s most known for along with his role in Good Witch as Nick Radford, which currently airs on the Hallmark Channel. Rhys has won an award for his role in Ties That Bind.
